issue.title: import_ISO19139.sql script needs to be adapted to new DB structure
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

import_ISO19139.sql script needs to be adapted to new DB structure.

Added by Clément Brunet here: https://forge.easysdi.org/boards/34/topics/627

```

The column 'meta' of the table portail_sdi_resourcetype is now named 'application', line 70 in the import_ISO19139.sql file.
```


We should check the update scripts for any other columns are affected.

file : https://forge.easysdi.org/attachments/download/647/import_ISO19139.sql
page : https://forge.easysdi.org/projects/easysdi/wiki/4_catalog_configuration
